A2 towards or on the highest floor or floors of a building: an upstairs landing/window He heard glass breaking and ran upstairs to see what had caused it. Opposite
downstairs
More examplesFewer examplesHe's upstairs doing his homework.I wish those people upstairs would stop stamping around.The upstairs lounge is darker and more casual.She took the child by the hand and led him upstairs to bed.I'll pop upstairs and get it for you.
